newsitem.title: CANADA: ARC Energy Trust sets C$68 mln unit issue.
newsitem.headline: ARC Energy Trust sets C$68 mln unit issue.

text.p: ARC Energy Trust said on Monday it would issue 6.5 million trust units at C$10.45 each for gross proceeds of C$68 million.

ARC Energy, an oil and gas royalty trust formed last year from Mobil Oil Canada spinoff properties, said its prospectus also qualified for distribution 1.1 million units upon the exercise of the same number of previously issued special warrants for gross proceeds of C$12 million.

The units were offered through a syndicate of underwriters led by RBC Dominion Securities Inc. Other undwriters included ScotiaMcLeod Inc, Nesbitt Burns Inc, CIBC Wood Gundy Securities Inc, Midland Walwyn Canada Inc, Levesque Beaubien Geoffrion Inc and TD Securities Inc.
Net proceeds were to be used to fund an earlier acquisition of properties producing 1,800 barrels of oil equivalent per day and to provide capital to pursue other purchases, ARC Energy said.
